unalcol.tracer

Class Tracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.tracer.Tracer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutputStreamTracer, SingleResultTracer

    public abstract class Tracer
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracer

    Abstract definition of an object's Tracer (stores useful information of objects).

    Source code is available.

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void add(java.lang.Object... obj)
      Adds an object sent by an object to the tracer
      static boolean addTracer(java.lang.Object owner, Tracer tracer)
      Add an object that can call the associated tracing process.
      abstract void clean()
      Cleans the traced information
      static void clean(java.lang.Object obj)
      Cleans each tracer associated to a given object
      abstract void close()
      Closes the tracer
      static void close(java.lang.Object obj)
      Closes each tracer associated to a given object
      abstract java.lang.Object get()
      Returns the traced object
      static Tracer[] get(java.lang.Object owner)
      Obtains a list of the tracing process that can be carried on by an object
      boolean start()
      Starts the tracing of objects process
      boolean stop()
      Stops the tracing of objects process
      static void trace(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.Object... data)
      Adds a traceable data object to each tracer associated to a given object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tracer

        public Tracer()
        Default constructor

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public boolean start()
        Starts the tracing of objects process
        Returns:
        true if the Tracer was tracing objects, falseotherwise.

      • stop

        public boolean stop()
        Stops the tracing of objects process
        Returns:
        true if the Tracer was tracing objects, falseotherwise.

      • add

        public abstract void add(java.lang.Object... obj)
        Adds an object sent by an object to the tracer
        Parameters:
        obj - Traced information to be added

      • get

        public abstract java.lang.Object get()
        Returns the traced object
        Returns:
        An object representing the traced information

      • clean

        public abstract void clean()
        Cleans the traced information

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Closes the tracer

      • addTracer

        public static boolean addTracer(java.lang.Object owner,
                                Tracer tracer)
        Add an object that can call the associated tracing process.
        Parameters:
        owner - Object that can call the tracing process.
        tracer - Trace process that can be used by the object.
        Returns:
        trueIf the tracer process can be associated to the given object, falseotherwise.

      • get

        public static Tracer[] get(java.lang.Object owner)
        Obtains a list of the tracing process that can be carried on by an object
        Parameters:
        owner - The object that can carry on the trace process
        Returns:
        A list of the tracing process that can be carried on by an object, the list will have length zero if the object has not trace process that can carry on.

      • trace

        public static void trace(java.lang.Object obj,
                         java.lang.Object... data)
        Adds a traceable data object to each tracer associated to a given object
        Parameters:
        obj - Object carrying on the trace process
        data - Object to be added to each tracer associated to the object

      • close

        public static void close(java.lang.Object obj)
        Closes each tracer associated to a given object
        Parameters:
        obj - Object being traced

      • clean

        public static void clean(java.lang.Object obj)
        Cleans each tracer associated to a given object
        Parameters:
        obj - Object being traced
